snippet: Marcos Senna, a 36-year-old former Spanish national team midfielder, signed with the Cosmos, who start play in August in the second-tier North American Soccer League.
abstract: Marcos Senna, a  former Spanish national team midfielder, signs with the New York Cosmos; team starts play in second-tier North American Soccer League in August; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marcos Senna, a 36-year-old former Spanish national team midfielder, signed with the Cosmos, who start play in August in the second-tier North American Soccer League.
